member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1
member.summary: The Kanban component is an efficient way to visually depict various stages of a process using cards with transparent workflows.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.IsFirstEventRender
member.summary: Specifies refresh without data process and new row generation.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.IsCollectionChanged
member.summary: If IsCollectionChanged is set to true then it will allow observableCollection data to make change in GridContent.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.ComponentDispose
member.summary: Handles dispose component.
member.remarks: Destroyed event will be invoked if any. Set current state of grid in window.localStorage if EnablePersistence is set as true.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.CallStateHasChangedAsync
member.summary: Invoke state change.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.Syncfusion#Blazor#Kanban#IKanban#PropertyChanged
member.summary: Invoked when kanban properties are dynamically changed.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Used to get the corresponding Column data.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.accessor
member.summary: Gets or sets the fast reflection accessor to reflect the data.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.ID
member.summary: Specifies the unique identifier.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.ChildContent
member.summary: Defines the child content.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.AllowDragAndDrop
member.summary: Enables or disables the drag and drop actions in the Kanban.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.AllowKeyboard
member.summary: When this property is set to true, it allows the keyboard interaction in the Kanban board.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.CardSettings
member.summary: Defines the Kanban board related settings such as header field, content field, template, show or hide header, and single or multiple selection.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.Columns
member.summary: Defines the Kanban board columns and their properties such as header text, key field, template, allow toggle, expand or collapse state, min or max count, and show or hide item count.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.ConstraintType
member.summary: Defines the constraint type used to apply validation based on column or swimlane. The possible values are: Column Swimlane.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.CssClass
member.summary: It is used to customize the Kanban, which accepts custom CSS class names that define specific user-defined styles and themes to be applied on the Kanban element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.DataSource
member.summary: Accepts the list items either through local or remote service and binds it to the component. It can be passed either as List or else can create an instance of the `SfDataManager` in case of processing remote data and can be assigned to the `DataSource` property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.DataSourceChanged
member.summary: Invokes when data source changes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.DialogSettings
member.summary: Defines the dialog settings such as template and fields.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.EnableRtl
member.summary: Enable or disable rendering component in the right to left direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.EnableTooltip
member.summary: Enables or disables the tooltip in the Kanban board. The property relates to the tooltipTemplate property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.Syncfusion#Blazor#Kanban#IKanban#KanbanTemplates
member.summary: Enables or disables template in the Kanban board. The property relates to the tooltipTemplate property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.Height
member.summary: Sets the `Height` of the Kanban component, accepting both string and number values. The string type includes either pixel or percentage values. When `height` is set with specific pixel value, then the Kanban will be rendered to that specified space. In case, if `auto` value is set, then the height of the Kanban gets auto-adjusted within the given container.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.KeyField
member.summary: Defines the key field of the Kanban board. The Kanban renders its layout based on this key field.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.Locale
member.summary: Overrides the global culture and localization value for this component. Default global culture is 'en-US'.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.Query
member.summary: Defines the external `Query` that will be executed along with the data processing.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.SortSettings
member.summary: Defines the sort settings such as field and direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.StackedHeaders
member.summary: Defines the stacked header for Kanban columns with text and key fields.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.SwimlaneSettings
member.summary: Defines the swimlane settings to the Kanban board such as key field, text field, template, allow drag-and-drop, show or hide an empty row, show or hide items count, and more.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.Width
member.summary: Sets the `Width` of the Kanban component, accepting both string and number values. The string value can be either pixel or percentage format. When set to `auto`, the Kanban width gets auto-adjusted and displays its content related to the viewable screen size.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SfKanban`1.ExternalDropId
member.summary: Defines the ID of drop component on which drop should occur.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SwimlaneSettingsModel
member.summary: Interface for the class SwimlaneSettings.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SwimlaneSettingsModel.AllowDragAndDrop
member.summary: Enables or disables the drag and drop actions in the Kanban.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SwimlaneSettingsModel.KeyField
member.summary: Defines the key field of the Kanban board. The Kanban renders its layout based on this key field.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SwimlaneSettingsModel.ShowEmptyRow
member.summary: Enable or disable empty swimlane.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SwimlaneSettingsModel.ShowItemCount
member.summary: Enable or disable items count.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SwimlaneSettingsModel.SortDirection
member.summary: Sort the swimlane resources. The possible values are: Ascending Descending.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SwimlaneSettingsModel.TextField
member.summary: Defines the swimlane header text field.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SwimlaneSettingsModel.Template
member.summary: Defines the swimlane template.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.SwimlaneSettingsModel.Count
member.summary: Defines the swimlane card count.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanTargetDetails`1.ColumnKeyField
member.summary: Returns the column key field based on the mouse cursor position.
member.value: It return the column key field. The default value is String.Empty.
member.remarks: Returns the Kanban column key field.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanTargetDetails`1.SwimlaneKeyField
member.summary: Returns the swimlane key field based on the current mouse position.
member.value: It return the swimlane key field. The default value is null.
member.remarks: Returns the Kanban swimlane key field based on the mouse cursor.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanTargetDetails`1.Index
member.summary: Returns the mouse event arguments.
member.value: It return the current card position in the column. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanTargetDetails`1.PreviousCardId
member.summary: Returns the previous card id based on the cursor position.
member.value: It return the previous card unique field Id. The default value is null.
member.remarks: It is used when setting the as `Index`.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanTargetDetails`1.PreviousCardData
member.summary: Returns the previous card data.
member.value: It return the previous card data. The default value is null.
member.remarks: It is used when setting the as `Index`.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanTargetDetails`1.CurrentCardId
member.summary: Returns the current card id based on the cursor position.
member.value: It returns the current card Id based on current mouse position. The default value is null.
member.remarks: It will return the current card Id when the cursor moved inside the card element.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings
member.summary: Defines the Kanban board dialog settings and their properties such as allow dragging, animation, template, close on escape, css class, enable resize, height, enable Modal, minimum height, position, target, show close icon, width, fields and z-index.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.ChildContent
member.summary: Defines the child content.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.AllowDragging
member.summary: Specifies the value that indicates whether the dialog component can be dragged by the end-user or not. The dialog allows to drag by selecting the header and dragging it for re-position the dialog.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.AnimationSettings
member.summary: Specifies the animation settings of the dialog component. The animation effect can be applied to open and close the dialog with duration and delay.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.CloseOnEscape
member.summary: Specifies the boolean value that indicates whether the dialog can be closed with the escape key (used to control the dialog closing behavior) or not.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.CssClass
member.summary: Specifies the CSS class name that can be appended with the root element of the dialog. One or more custom CSS classes can be added to a dialog.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.EnableResize
member.summary: Specifies the value that indicates whether the dialog component can be resized by the end-user or not. If enableResize is true, the dialog component creates a grip to resize its diagonal direction.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.Height
member.summary: Specifies the height of the dialog component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.IsModal
member.summary: Specifies the Boolean value that indicates whether the dialog can be displayed as modal or non-modal. `Modal`: It creates an overlay that disables interaction with the parent application and the user who should respond with modal before continuing with other applications. `Modeless`: It does not prevent user interaction with the parent application.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.MinHeight
member.summary: Specifies the min-height of the dialog component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.Position
member.summary: Specifies the value where the dialog can be positioned within the document or target. The position can be represented with pre-configured positions or specific X and Y values. ` X value`: left, center, right, or offset value. `Y value`: top, center, bottom, or offset value.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.ShowCloseIcon
member.summary: Specifies the value that represents whether the close icon can be shown in the dialog component or not.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.Target
member.summary: Specifies the target element in which the dialog should be displayed. The default value is null, which refers to the `document.body` element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.Width
member.summary: Specifies the width of the dialog.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.ZIndex
member.summary: Specifies the z-index for rendering that determines whether the dialog is displayed in front or behind of another component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.KanbanDialogFields
member.summary: Defines the Kanban Dialog Settings fields and their properties such as key, text and type.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.Template
member.summary: Defines the dialog template.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanDialogSettings.OnInitializedAsync
member.summary: Method invoked when the component is ready to start.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1
member.summary: Configure event handlers to handle the events with Kanban component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.OnLoad
member.summary: This event allows customization of Kanban properties before rendering.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.ActionBegin
member.summary: Event triggers at the beginning of every Kanban action.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.ActionComplete
member.summary: Event triggers on successful completion of the Kanban actions.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.ActionFailure
member.summary: Event triggers when a Kanban action gets failed or interrupted and it will return an error information.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.CardClick
member.summary: Event triggers on single-clicking the Kanban cards.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.CardDoubleClick
member.summary: Event triggers on double-clicking the Kanban cards.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.CardRendered
member.summary: Event triggers before each card of the Kanban rendering on the page.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.Created
member.summary: Event triggers after the kanban component is created.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.DataBinding
member.summary: Event triggers before the data binds to the Kanban.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.DialogClose
member.summary: Event triggers before the dialog closes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.DialogOpen
member.summary: Event triggers before the dialog opens.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.DragStart
member.summary: Event triggers when the card drag actions start.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.DragStop
member.summary: Event triggers when the card drag actions stop.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.QueryCellInfo
member.summary: Event triggers before each column of the Kanban rendering on the page.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.SwimlaneSorting
member.summary: Event triggers before swimlane rows rendering on the page.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Blazor.Kanban.KanbanEvents`1.OnInitializedAsync
member.summary: Method invoked when the component is ready to start.
member.returns: A System.Threading.Tasks.Task representing any asynchronous operation.
